post.text: At the Commander-in-Chief forum, Trump disrespected our generals, our country, and women in the military. Who did he praise? Putin.

comment.author: Jose
comment.text: And you have disrespected OUR country with the incidents in Benghazi and deleting evidence....At least Trump is already spitting out what comes to mind and then your campaign catches phrases to turn and make him say something else.. Which is why I hate social media because it is completely brainwashing everyone in this election.. Your just waiting to say and do all the corruption when you get in office which hopefully will never happen. These are the two candidates we get stuck with out of all the amazing people we have in the U.S? Either way I am voting for Trump.. He has a better track record than this woman.

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: Clump the clown is a POS flush him down the toilet come November why wait push the handle now

replies.author: Jose
replies.text: At least he's not a traitor though.. Should we lock her up and flush the key?

replies.author: Indy
replies.text: You poor misguided foolish woman....get back on your medication dear

replies.author: Jose
replies.text: You sound pretty closed minded as well sir.. Maybe I can spare some of my "meds" with you
